name: Berry White
description: Berry White is a hybrid strain that is the offspring of parents of near-celebrity status in the cannabis world: Blueberry and White Widow. Berry is famous in its own right for its even, balanced effects that offer relaxation from stress and anxiety along with a sense of euphoria. This strain is perfect for inspiring an upbeat mood and may lead to conversation and creative pursuits. This plantâ€™s flowers have a light sour berry and pine smell and a fresh taste similar to their scent. They generally have a strong blue coloring contrasted by orange hairs.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Sleepy, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious
